name: Never Apart - Concept
description:
How To Play: Move with Arrow Keys 

Disclosure:

-After the asteroid game when the screen goes black it is supposed to be a cutscene it works in unity but idk what happens when I export it. I have uploaded the video for you to see. Please check out the video it is essential to the flow of the game. 

-Also, the game is only a couple scenes once you get to the end where the game is black and white and just drawn that is the end of the prototype. 

What Works: 

- the mini game in between the first dialog and the player can move to next scene by walking. 

Whats Not working:

- I have the cut Scenes working but for some reason i cant export it correctly?!

This is a game I plan on making about working together in order to survive. I plan on the game being a playable short story about two rebels on the run who find themselves in a sticky situation. I hope that development goes well and you guys enjoy.

Prototype: I just wanted to work out how cut scenes would be incorporated. I really want it to be a story game so its heavy on the cutscenes and art but i also want it to still be a playable game and i expect to add more minigames as like in the beginning before you crash there is a quick minigame to be played of dodging asteroids. I am worried because i don't have the best art skills and i have high expectations and I'm not sure ill be able to achieve what i want.
